content: the crochet textured granny baby blanket is something i came up with because i love the simplicity of a granny square but don t like the big holes it creates i thought what can and do a bit different and this is what was i came up with i have a couple other projects using this same stitch that i will release soon i created this one as a from the middle square using bernat® bundle up™ yarn i created a check off list you can print and follow if you like my color design but honestly any colors and designs will work just match your hook to your yarn and you will be good to go this is a great project when you are relaxing with tv or chatting with others
